mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, video_path as videoPath, video_url as videoUrl, cover_path as coverPath, cover_url as coverUrl, duration, category, user_id as userId, uploader_name as uploaderName, views, likes, status, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, tags FROM draft_video WHERE status = 2 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM draft_video WHERE status = 2

SELECT v.id, v.title, v.description, v.video_path as videoPath, v.video_url as videoUrl, v.cover_path as coverPath, v.cover_url as coverUrl, v.duration, v.category, v.user_id as userId, v.uploader_name as uploaderName, v.views, v.likes, v.status, v.create_time as createTime, v.update_time as updateTime, v.tags, u.username, u.avatar_url as avatarUrl, u.nickname FROM ( SELECT * FROM video WHERE id = #{id} UNION ALL SELECT * FROM draft_video WHERE id = #{id} ) v LEFT JOIN user u ON v.user_id = u.id LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video ( title, description, video_path, video_url, cover_path, cover_url, duration, category, user_id, uploader_name, views, likes, status, create_time, update_time, tags ) SELECT title, description, video_path, video_url, cover_path, cover_url, duration, category, user_id, uploader_name, views, likes, status, create_time, update_time, tags FROM draft_video WHERE id = #{id}
